name: CrashApe Trijam 115
description:
Made for Trijam 115 in ~4 hours 

Just drag the form on the right color or form (depending on current mode)

- Sound-FX made with  raylibtech.itch.io/rfxgen

- Font by Riciery Leal dafont.com/vcr-osd-mono.font

-Music made with boscaceoil.net

-Sprites drawn with https://www.piskelapp.com/
